briefTitle: Assessing the Usability and Clinical Utility of the Congo Red Dot Test: A Case-control Study
officialTitle: Assessing the Usability and Clinical Utility of the Congo Red Dot Test: A Case-control Study

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Postpartum
* Clinical diagnosis of preeclampsia (severe, mild or superimposed) including eclampsia (n=100) OR Clinically healthy (n=50)
* Eligible to consent for research
* Agree to comply with study procedures
* Able to give informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* None

primary.measure: Prevalence of Urine Congophilia Using Congo Red Test GV-005
primary.description: Prevalence of urine congophilia using Congo Red test GV-005
primary.timeFrame: within 72 hours of urine sample collection
